user.title: Set up CTGP Deluxe
user.description: This integration will track the latest version and details of CTGP Deluxe. There is no further configuration needed.

website_change.title: CTGP-DX website structure changed
website_change.description: The integration has been unable to fetch data from the CTGP-DX website for more than 24 hours. It is likely that the website structure has changed. Please report this issue on GitHub.
